mapper.select: SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE sn = #{sn} AND bn = #{bn} AND id = #{id}
SELECT outId FROM eqpt_outrepository WHERE outId LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{outId},'%'))

SELECT DISTINCT ID_ AS outId FROM w_lysqq WHERE ID_ NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) UNION SELECT DISTINCT ID_ AS outId FROM w_zdsqq WHERE ID_ NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository)
SELECT DISTINCT ID_ AS outId FROM w_xsfh WHERE ID_ NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository)
SELECT DISTINCT wdbh AS outId FROM w_xsfhtzd

SELECT w_lymx21.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_lymx21.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_lymx21.F_GGXH AS spec,w_lymx21.F_XQSL AS outNum,w_jyd.F_XLH AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_lymx21 WHERE REF_ID_ = #{wdbh} AND eqpt_material.id = w_lymx21.F_WLBM UNION SELECT w_cgmx11.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_cgmx11.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_cgmx11.F_GGXH AS spec,w_cgmx11.F_CGSL AS outNum,w_cgmx11.F_WLMC AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_cgmx11 WHERE REF_ID_ = #{wdbh} AND eqpt_material.id = w_cgmx11.F_WLBM

SELECT w_cpmx20.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_cpmx20.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_cpmx20.F_GGXH AS spec,w_cpmx20.F_XQSL AS outNum,w_cpmx20.F_WLMC AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_cpmx20 WHERE REF_ID_ = #{wdbh} AND eqpt_material.id = w_cpmx20.F_WLBM

SELECT w_xsfhtzd.wlbh AS materialId,w_xsfhtzd.wlmc AS materialName,w_xsfhtzd.ggxh AS spec,w_xsfhtzd.xqsl AS outNum,w_xsfhtzd.pch_xlh AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_xsfhtzd WHERE wdbh = #{wdbh} AND eqpt_material.id = w_xsfhtzd.wlbh
SELECT DISTINCT F_XLH FROM w_jyd WHERE F_WLBM = #{materialId}
SELECT w_xsfh.F_XMBH AS projId,w_xsfh.F_XMMC AS projName FROM w_xsfh WHERE ID_ = #{wdbh}
SELECT w_lysqq.F_XMBH AS projId,w_lysqq.F_XMMC AS projName FROM w_lysqq WHERE ID_ = #{wdbh}
